text: The 2017 South Alabama Jaguars baseball team represents the University of South Alabama in the 2017 NCAA Division I baseball season. The Jaguars play their home games at Eddie Stanky Field. ==Schedule and results== South Alabama announced its 2017 football schedule on November 7, 2016. The 2017 schedule consists of 25 home and 31 away games in the regular season. The Jaguars will host Sun Belts foes Coastal Carolina, Georgia State, Little Rock, Texas State, and Troy and will travel to Appalachian State, Arkansas State, Georgia Southern, Louisiana–Lafayette, and Louisiana–Monroe. The 2017 Sun Belt Conference Championship will be contested May 24–28 in Statesboro, Georgia, and will be hosted by Georgia Southern. South Alabama finished 2nd in the east division of the conference which qualified the Jaguars to compete in the tournament as the 3rd seed for the team's 12th tournament title. {| class="toccolours" width=70% style="both; text-align:center;" |- ! colspan=2 style="" | 2017 South Alabama Baseball Game Log |- ! colspan=2 style="" | Regular Season (36–19) |- valign="top" | {| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" style="margin:auto; width:100%; text-align:left; font-size:95%" ! colspan=12 style="padding-left:4em;" | February (5–3) |- !
